EmailTemplate.name: QSOL INQUIRY - Fleet Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: QSOL INQUIRY - Fleet Customer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
Cummins QuickServe Online (QSOL) is the best source of Cummins engine parts and service information.
To subscribe for Fleet access to QSOL, please complete the attached subscription form and return it to the Cummins Support Centre along with your purchase order at this email address. Please include main point of contact information (noted at the bottom of this email in bold). We will create your individual users as detailed on your completed form, and charge you for the annual subscription fee of $XXXXX+GST. (CSP4021436)
There is also a Quickserve version for Cummins Power Generation (CPG) $XXXXX+GST (CSP4022039)
The subscription is for 12 months from the day we create the subscription. Although there are only 11 spaces for users on the form, there is no limit to how many users you may create under your fleet subscription - just fill in additional copies of the form as required.
Globally, User name needs to be in email format, it can be the same as your email address. Example: john@trucks.com If the user name you request is not available we will create one similar for you. You can also leave user name blank for us to create for you if required.
You may have as many users under the one subscription - The fee you pay is an annual fee NOT per person. Usernames must be minimum of 5 characters Once we have activated - you will receive an email from Quickserve with your log in details. On first time log in you will be prompted to change your password. Minimum of 6 characters. You may then be required to log in again.
You will need to provide the following for main point of contact (for your business):
1. Purchase Order: 2. Main person of Contact: Name: 3. Email address: 4. Phone number: 5. Address:
(See attached file: 3. QSOL - FLEET MATRIX.pdf)(See attached file: 1. QSOL Subscription Form.docx)
If you have any other questions about QSOL or the registration process, you can call 1300 286 646 or email 1300cummins@cummins.com
Regards
Cummins Support Centre
E. 1300cummins@cummins.com AUSTRALIA T 1300Cummins | F 1300 286 600 | NEW ZEALAND T 0800Cummins | F 0800 286 600
PARTS | MON - FRI 8.00am - 8.30pm AEST | SAT 8.00am - 3.00pm AEST SERVICE | 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
Want to know more about Cummins' LEGENDARY service? Click here.
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email and any attachments are for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient and may contain privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not read, distribute or take action in reliance upon this message. If you have received this in error, please notify us immediately by return email and promptly delete this message and its attachments from your computer system. We do not waive attorney-client or work product privilege by the transmission of this message.
